005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
013
014/**
015 * A base class for definitions defined globally within a Metaschema module.
016 *
017 * @param <MODULE>
018 *          the Java type of the containing module
019 * @param <INSTANCE>
020 *          the expected Java type of an instance of this definition
021 */
022public abstract class AbstractGlobalDefinition<MODULE extends IModule, INSTANCE extends INamedInstance>
023    implements IDefinition {
024  @NonNull
025  private final MODULE module;
026  @NonNull
027  private final Lazy<IEnhancedQName> qname;
028  @NonNull
029  private final Lazy<IEnhancedQName> definitionQName;
030
031  /**
032   * Construct a new global definition.
033   *
034   * @param module
035   *          the parent module containing this instance
036   * @param initializer
037   *          the callback used to generate qualified names
038   */
039  protected AbstractGlobalDefinition(@NonNull MODULE module, @NonNull NameInitializer initializer) {
040    this.module = module;
041    this.qname = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> initializer.apply(getEffectiveName())));
042    this.definitionQName = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> initializer.apply(getName())));
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  public final MODULE getContainingModule() {
047    return module;
048  }
049
050  @SuppressWarnings("null")
051  @Override
052  public final IEnhancedQName getQName() {
053    return qname.get();
054  }
055
056  @SuppressWarnings("null")
057  @Override
058  public final IEnhancedQName getDefinitionQName() {
059    return definitionQName.get();
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public boolean isInline() {
064    // never inline
065    return false;
066  }
067
068  @Override
069  public final INSTANCE getInlineInstance() {
070    // never inline
071    return null;
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Provides a callback for generating a qualified name from a name.
076   */
077  @FunctionalInterface
078  public interface NameInitializer {
079    /**
080     * Produce a qualified name by parsing the provided name.
081     *
082     * @param name
083     *          the name to parse
084     * @return the qualified name for the provided name
085     */
086    @NonNull
087    IEnhancedQName apply(@NonNull String name);
088  }
089}
